summary: Just some minor modifications I did for practice.
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone. This mod is something I did just to shake the rust off. I am happy to see that the Creation Kit hasn\'t really changed.

If you have any suggestions on what you might like to see added just let me know and I might add them.

Constructive criticism is always welcome but please, keep it civil.

-Description-
This is a modification of Breezehome in Whiterun that I did for myself. Like I stated above, this mod is just a warm-up but I may change a few things around in the future.

-Features-
Added a safe to the Bedroom Upgrade. (A small present is inside the safe)
Added a few extras to the Kitchen Upgrade.
Changed a few containers to non-respawn. (they were marked as respawnable in the Creation Kit).

-Versions-
1.0 - Initial Release

-Credits-
Bethesda for making another great game.
The Nexus Team for giving us a place to upload our mods.
author: Rendan
